languages.text: "Всем сохранившим верность династии: говорит Лорд-капитан этого судна. Я жив{mf||а} и веду бой против мятежников".
"To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
languages.original_text: "Всем сохранившим верность династии: говорит Лорд-капитан этого судна. Я жив{mf||а} и веду бой против мятежников".

traits.locale_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
"This is Lord Captain speaking. Yes, I am pretty much still alive."
"To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
"This is the Lord Captain speaking. Yes, I am more or less still alive."
"To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
"To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
"To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
"To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."

languages.text: «A todos los que siguen siendo fieles a la dinastía, les habla su Lord Capitán. Sigo viv{mf|o|a} y estoy luchando contra los amotinados».
languages.original_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: «A todos los que siguen siendo fieles a la dinastía, les habla su Lord Capitán. Sigo viv{mf|o|a} y estoy luchando contra los amotinados».

languages.text: 「王朝への忠誠を守り続けているすべての者たちよ、こちらはロード・キャプテン。{mf|俺|私}はまだ生きていて、反乱軍との戦いを続けている」
languages.original_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: 「王朝への忠誠を守り続けているすべての者たちよ、こちらはロード・キャプテン。{mf|俺|私}はまだ生きていて、反乱軍との戦いを続けている」

languages.text: “所有忠于王朝的船员们，都听好：我是领主舰长。我还活着，我还在对付那些叛乱分子。”
languages.original_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: “所有忠于王朝的船员们，都听好：我是领主舰长。我还活着，我还在对付那些叛乱分子。”

languages.text: "An alle loyalen Untertanen der Dynastie: Hier spricht der Lord Captain. Ich bin noch am Leben und werde den Kampf gegen die Meuterer fortsetzen."
languages.original_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: "An alle loyalen Untertanen der Dynastie: Hier spricht der Lord Captain. Ich bin noch am Leben und werde den Kampf gegen die Meuterer fortsetzen."

languages.text: « À tous ceux qui restent fidèles à la dynastie, c'est {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} qui vous parle. Je suis encore en vie, et la lutte contre les mutins suit son cours. »
languages.original_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: « À tous ceux qui restent fidèles à la dynastie, c'est {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} qui vous parle. Je suis encore en vie, et la lutte contre les mutins suit son cours. »

languages.text: "Hanedanlığa hâlâ sadık olanlara sesleniyorum, Lord Kaptanınız konuşuyor. Yaşıyorum ve isyancılara karşı savaşımızı sürdürüyorum."
languages.original_text: "To all who remain loyal to the dynasty: this is the Lord Captain speaking. I am still alive and continuing the fight against the mutineers."
